author: jorton
msg: * shmem/unix/shm.c (apr_shm_remove): Ensure that the file is removed
even if the shm segment has already been destroyed; close the file

author: ake
msg: WIN64: avoid unresolved external error with 64 bit build

author: minfrin
msg: Makes the threads to behave like on posix. If the thread is created without
APR_DETACH expect that the thread_join will be called, so don't close the
handle in advance, if the thread has already finished.
